East is east and west is west and never the twain shall meet!

Nah, that might happen sooner than I can get this woring. 

```{r, fig.align='center'}
library(ggplot2)
library(viridis)
ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) + geom_hex() + scale_fill_viridis()
```

So there it is ...
